resources.string: > DragonetPE App Version: 0.0.1-preR1\n> For Dragonet Server Version: 0.0.2-preRx\n

* You must set Dragonet server and port here or you won't be able to use Dragonet PE Addon.
 * To join a server, add a new external server with these info:
 * - IP: 127.0.0.1 (default)
 * - Port: 29132
 * This is NOT Dragonet's server's port.
